author: tfischer
msg: The generator now builds the MapBuilders such that the columns of the TableMap contain the correct size and scale as provided in the schema.xml.
Thanks to Greg Monroe for the patch.

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-522 - ERROR X0Y79 raised when adding comments using "--" before sql queries with Network Client

author: djd
msg: DERBY-615 Switch to a security manager policy file with permissions set on a per-jar
basis for improved testing under a security manager. First step in running all tests
under a security manager. This policy file replaces the nwsvr.policy file and currently
is used in the same way, for tests that invoke a separate JVM for the network server.

author: cziegeler
msg: Remove extra handling of full screen, it's just another size now
